2014-03-04

Chains: (What's The Story) Morning Glory? to Suburban Light

To-day I listened to Oasis' (What's The Story) Morning Glory? which I'll blog about later. To-day also, The Clientele announced they'll be releasing and improved and extended version of Suburban Light (one of those things is CONSIDERABLY more exciting than the other!)

So here's how I get from one to another

Oasis - Don't Look Back in Anger

The Television Personalities - Look Back in Anger

The Television Personalities - Picture of Dorian Gray

The Clientele - Picture of Dorain Gray

The Clientele - Saturday

BONUS - this started off as a "One shot" post but having changed it there was no space for Seam's rather good cover of Look Back in Anger... so I'm including it anyway.
